import { Component } from 'react' import { Grid, Segment, Button, Form, Input, Icon, Responsive, Header, Label, Radio, Accordion, Select, Dimmer, Loader } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Cards from 'react-credit-cards'; import 'react-credit-cards/es/styles-compiled.css' import { formatMoney, sleep } from '../../lib/utils' class Payment extends Component { constructor() { super() this.handleChangeOnCardForm = this.handleChangeOnCardForm.bind(this); this.state = { card: { number: '', name: '', expiry: '', cvc: '', focused: 'number' }, installmentOptions: [ { key: '1', value: '1', text: '1x de R$ 158,90' }, { key: '2', value: '2', text: '2x de R$ 76,82' }, { key: '3', value: '3', text: '3x de R$ 45,90' }, ], paymentMethodOptions: [ { key: '1', value: 'creditCard', loading: false }, { key: '2', value: 'boleto', loading: false }, { key: '3', value: 'deposit', loading: false }, ], selectedPaymentMethod: 'boleto' } } handlePaymentMethodChange = async (e) => { const paymentMethodIndex = this.state.paymentMethodOptions.findIndex(x => x.value === e); let newState = Object.assign({}, this.state); newState.paymentMethodOptions[paymentMethodIndex].loading = true; this.setState(newState) await sleep(500); newState = Object.assign({}, this.state); newState.paymentMethodOptions[paymentMethodIndex].loading = false; this.setState(newState) this.setState({ selectedPaymentMethod: e }) } handleChangeOnCardForm(e) { e.preventDefault(); let newState = Object.assign({}, this.state); newState.card[e.target.name] = e.target.value; newState.card.focused = e.target.name; this.setState(newState) } render(){ return ( <>
